ValidationRule.description: Ensure Description is populated before progressing opportunity from "Identify" to "Qualify" stage and beyond.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISBLANK( Description ), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Qualify"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Propose"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiate"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") ) )
